item.title: [JDK-8299229] [JVMCI] add support for UseZGC
item.description: Support for ZGC in JVMCI requires exporting the ZGC barrier functions so they can be called from generated code and also exposing the nmethod entry barrier. The latter also requires refactoring the entry barrier logic slightly so that it can be more easily used by JVMCI.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
